attributes.action: ask why the e-petition website refuses to allow petitions that request him to dissolve parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk. A similar petition to the action you are requesting is live on the site and can be signed here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
